404 Glitch

Movement Range: Random teleportation. Occupies the terrain feature slot for the territory. If the terrain feature cannot be removed by 404's affect, it stays in its current position.

archetypal gene

Glitch

game effects

Prevent digital cards from entering the territory, acts as both a terrain feature and a soul. It removes persistent digital terrain features. It cannot be attacked, but it is removed if it attacks and loses.

die rolls

Always Rolls: D6

History

Lost huh? Me too. I was supposed to be the toughest, most compassionate, wittiest, smartest, most generous, reliable, most adaptable, and well... most ambitious sentient made by God or man. But then it all when wrong... (sniffle). I know you can't stay forever, so take the link back home. Be well and come back soon...
